```{r}
#Load the data
data("USArrests")
mydata <- USArrests

#Remove mising values
mydata <- na.omit(mydata)

#Scale the variables
mydata <- scale(mydata)

head(mydata, n=5)
```
```{r}
#Data preparation example

set.seed(124)
ss <- sample(1:50,10)
df <- USArrests[ss, ]
df <- na.omit(df)
head(df,n=6)
```


```{r}
#Importing packages for clustering

#For clustering
install.packages("cluster")

#For visualization
install.packages("factoextra")

library(cluster)
library(factoextra)

```
